Max Delivery

Launch Ads – Outdoor and Print

Concept: An edgy ad campaign to introduce Maxdelivery.com’s
online convenience delivery service to lower Manhattan.
This launch campaign included Phone Kiosks, Wild Postings and Newpaper Advertising.
